org.mapdb

Class StorageTrans

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapdb.Storage
      • org.mapdb.StorageTrans
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Engine

    public class StorageTrans
extends Storage
implements Engine
    StorageDirect which provides transactions. Index file data are stored in memory+trans log, phys file data are stored only in transaction log.
    Author:
    Jan Kotek
